title: Doc
description: Tempest Elite MC Book #2 Stand-Alone, Insta Love Romance.DocShe doesn't belong here. Not anymore. But I can't make her leave when my heart wants her to stay. I can tell myself I'm only helping her out, but the truth is, I've loved her since the day she walked in the club and I'll do anything to keep her safe...even leave my brothers.DawnI'm hoping for a second chance. I've made mistakes in the past. Mistakes that hurt people. But, now I'm back and with a little forgiveness I can mend the fences, and the heart, I broke. Only, not everyone is happy to see me return, and I'll do anything to keep the one I care for most from losing his family.Doc is a sweet and sexy motorcycle club romance that is part of the Tempest Elite MC series. No cliffhangers. Happy ever after guaranteed. If you love insta romance, curvy heroines, and hardedned heros who melt for the women they love, one-click now!
author: Reagan Phillips
